Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 2 Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika » 2.2 Sahetukaduka, Kusalattika » 2.2.2 Akusalapada » 2.2.2.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Nahetu-naadhipati
Hetugocchaka, Kusalattika
Sahetukaduka, Kusalattika
Akusalapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Nahetu-naadhipati
11.
1267Sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1)
1268Sahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
12.
1269Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, navippayutte pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1270Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1271Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1272(Sahajātavāropi paccayavāropi nissayavāropi saṃsaṭṭhavāropi sampayuttavāropi paṭiccavārasadisā vitthāretabbā.)
